member.name: T:Aquality.Selenium.Support.Locators.ByImage
member.summary: Locator to search elements by image. Takes screenshot and finds match using openCV. Then finds elements by coordinates using JavaScript.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Support.Locators.ByImage.#ctor(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.param: Image file to locate element by.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Support.Locators.ByImage.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.param: Image bytes to locate element by.

member.name: P:Aquality.Selenium.Support.Locators.ByImage.Threshold
member.summary: Threshold of image similarity. Should be a float between 0 and 1, where 1 means 100% match, and 0.5 means 50% match.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Support.Locators.ByImage.GetElementOnPoint(OpenCvSharp.Point,OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext)
member.summary: Gets a single element on point (find by center coordinates, then select closest to matchLocation).
member.param: Location of the upper-left point of the element.
Search context. If the searchContext is Locatable (like WebElement), will adjust coordinates to be absolute coordinates.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Support.Locators.ByImage.DistanceToPoint(OpenCvSharp.Point,OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement)
member.summary: Calculates distance from element to matching point.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Support.Locators.ByImage.GetScreenshot(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext)
member.summary: Takes screenshot from searchContext if supported, or from browser. Performs screenshot scaling if devicePixelRatio != 1.
